column4: how do I know what files are important?  Do you mean files that are like, my pictures and files that I have or do you mean files that are part of the system?
Ok, so I don't have to worry about drive files, for cd and dvd or usb?
Ok, now about this secondary master drive that I have, how would I get it to start up if I can't get windows to load when I hook the power back to it?
